Package de.esoco.lib.manage

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Closeable
    A management interface for objects that can free allocated resources when being closed.
    Disposable
    Interface for objects that require disposal to end their life-cycle.
    ElementDefinition<T>
    Implementations of this interface define the elements which can be created by a certain factory implementation.
    Factory<T,D extends ElementDefinition<T>,E extends java.lang.Exception>
    The base interface that must be provided by factory implementations.
    Initializable
    Management interface that allows to initialize an object.
    Releasable
    Interface for manageable elements that can be released.
    RunCheck
    A management interface that provides a way to check if an object's thread or task execution is still running.
    Startable
    Management interface that allows to start an object's execution of a thread, a task, or similar.
    Stoppable
    Management interface that allows to stop an object.
    Transactional
    Interface for objects that are transactional, i.e. support the committing or rollback of state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultiLevelCache<K,V>
    Implementation of a multi-level cache based on Reference implementations.
    ResourceManager
    Thread-safe resource manager that manages reference counts for the contained resource objects and disposes them if the count reaches zero.
    Transaction
    A transaction class.
    TransactionManager
    A thread-based transaction manager implementation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TransactionException
    A runtime exception that will be thrown if a transaction that is managed by the TransactionManager fails.
